content:
[build-system]
requires = ["setuptools>=42", "wheel"]
build-backend = "setuptools.build_meta"

[project]
name = "hypercode"
version = "0.1.0"
description = "HyperCode programming language implementation"
readme = "README.md"
requires-python = ">=3.8"
license = {text = "MIT"}
authors = [
    {name = "Your Name", email = "your.email@example.com"},
]

[project.optional-dependencies]
dev = [
    "pytest>=7.0.0",
    "black>=22.1.0",
    "flake8>=4.0.0",
    "mypy>=0.930",
    "pytest-cov>=3.0.0",
]

[tool.black]
line-length = 100
target-version = ['py38']
include = '\.pyi?$'
